item.title: Three Key Traits of Blockchain Explained
item.description: Cryptocurrencies are now expanding their popularity ever than before. The price of dogecoin has skyrocketed due to Elon Musk. Web3 has been gaining massive traction from technological enthusiasts. Under the umbrella of the term DeFi, these applications geared to disrupt the current financial systems. Behind the secne is the Blockchain that are working to make those technologies possible. So is it Blockchain that forms the future of the Internet? We can’t be certain.
